Uses of Interface
android.view.IWindow

Packages that use IWindow
android.view Provides classes that expose basic user interface classes that handle screen layout and interaction with the user.

 void IWindowSession.setInsets(IWindow window, int touchableInsets, Rect contentInsets, Rect visibleInsets)
          Tell the window manager about the content and visible insets of the given window, which can be used to adjust the outContentInsets and outVisibleInsets values returned by relayout() for windows behind this one.
 void IWindowSession.setTransparentRegion(IWindow window, Region region)
          Give the window manager a hint of the part of the window that is completely transparent, allowing it to work with the surface flinger to optimize compositing of this part of the window.
